   19: %%
   20: -module(sasl_report_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   23: -export([gen_server_crash/1, gen_server_crash_unicode/1]).
   24: -export([gen_server_crash_chars_limit/1,
   25:          gen_server_crash_chars_limit_unicode/1]).
   26: -export([legacy_gen_server_crash/1, legacy_gen_server_crash_unicode/1]).
   27: 
   28: -export([crash_me/0,start_link/0,init/1,handle_cast/2,terminate/2]).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: 
   32: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [gen_server_crash,
   36:      gen_server_crash_unicode,
   37:      gen_server_crash_chars_limit,
   38:      gen_server_crash_chars_limit_unicode,
   39:      legacy_gen_server_crash,
   40:      legacy_gen_server_crash_unicode].
   41: 
   42: groups() ->
   43:     [].
   44: 
   45: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   55:     Config.
   56: 
   57: gen_server_crash(Config) ->
   58:     gen_server_crash(Config, latin1, depth).
   59: 
   60: gen_server_crash_unicode(Config) ->
   61:     gen_server_crash(Config, unicode, depth).
   62: 
   63: gen_server_crash_chars_limit(Config) ->
   64:     gen_server_crash(Config, latin1, chars_limit).
   65: 
   66: gen_server_crash_chars_limit_unicode(Config) ->
   67:     gen_server_crash(Config, unicode, chars_limit).
   68: 
   69: legacy_gen_server_crash(Config) ->
   70:     legacy_gen_server_crash(Config, latin1).
   71: 
   72: legacy_gen_server_crash_unicode(Config) ->
   73:     legacy_gen_server_crash(Config, unicode).
   74: 
   75: gen_server_crash(Config, Encoding, depth) ->
   76:     FormatterOpts = #{depth=>30},
   77:     gen_server_crash(Config, Encoding, FormatterOpts, 70000, 150000);
   78: gen_server_crash(Config, Encoding, chars_limit) ->
   79:     FormatterOpts = #{chars_limit=>50000, single_line=>true},
   80:     gen_server_crash(Config, Encoding, FormatterOpts, 50000, 100000).
   81: 
   82: gen_server_crash(Config, Encoding, FormatterOpts, Min, Max) ->
   83:     TC = list_to_atom(lists:concat([?FUNCTION_NAME,"_",Encoding])),
   84:     PrivDir = filename:join(?config(priv_dir,Config),?MODULE),
   85:     ConfigFileName = filename:join(PrivDir,TC),
   86:     KernelLog = filename:join(PrivDir,lists:concat([TC,"_kernel.log"])),
   87:     SaslLog = filename:join(PrivDir,lists:concat([TC,"_sasl.log"])),
   88:     KernelConfig = [{logger,[{handler,default,logger_std_h,
   89:                               #{config=>#{type=>{file,KernelLog}}}}]},
   90:                     {logger_sasl_compatible,true}],
   91:     Modes = [write, {encoding, Encoding}],
   92:     SaslConfig = [{sasl_error_logger,{file,SaslLog,Modes}}],
   93:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(SaslLog),
   94: 
   95:     ok = file:write_file(ConfigFileName ++ ".config",
   96:                          io_lib:format("[{kernel, ~p},~n{sasl, ~p}].",
   97:                                        [KernelConfig,SaslConfig])),
   98:     {ok,Peer,Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-boot", "start_sasl", "-kernel", "start_timer", "true",
   99:                    "-config", ConfigFileName]),
  100: 
  101:     %% Set depth or chars_limit.
  102:     ok = rpc:call(Node,logger,update_formatter_config,[default,FormatterOpts]),
  103:     ok = rpc:call(Node,logger,update_formatter_config,[sasl,FormatterOpts]),
  104: 
  105:     %% Make sure remote node logs it's own logs, and current node does
  106:     %% not log them.
  107:     ok = rpc:call(Node,logger,remove_handler_filter,[default,remote_gl]),
  108:     ok = rpc:call(Node,logger,remove_handler_filter,[sasl,remote_gl]),
  109:     ok = logger:add_primary_filter(no_remote,{fun(#{meta:=#{pid:=Pid}},_)
  110:                                                  when node(Pid)=/=node() -> stop;
  111:                                               (_,_) -> ignore
  112:                                            end,[]}),
  113:     ct:log("Local node Logger config:~n~p",
  114:            [logger:get_config()]),
  115:     ct:log("Remote node Logger config:~n~p",
  116:            [rpc:call(Node,logger,get_config,[])]),
  117:     ct:log("Remote node error_logger handlers: ~p",
  118:            [rpc:call(Node,error_logger,which_report_handlers,[])]),
  119: 
  120:     ok = rpc:call(Node,?MODULE,crash_me,[]),
  121: 
  122:     ok = rpc:call(Node,logger_std_h,filesync,[default]),
  123:     ok = rpc:call(Node,logger_std_h,filesync,[sasl]),
  124: 
  125:     peer:stop(Peer),
  126:     ok = logger:remove_primary_filter(no_remote),
  127: 
  128:     check_file(KernelLog, utf8, Min, Max),
  129:     check_file(SaslLog, Encoding, Min, Max),
  130: 
  131:     ok = file:delete(KernelLog),
  132:     ok = file:delete(SaslLog),
  133: 
  134:     ok.
  135: 
  136: legacy_gen_server_crash(Config, Encoding) ->
  137:     StopFilter = {fun(_,_) -> stop end, ok},
  138:     logger:add_handler_filter(default,stop_all,StopFilter),
  139:     logger:add_handler_filter(sasl,stop_all,StopFilter),
  140:     logger:add_handler_filter(cth_log_redirect,stop_all,StopFilter),
  141:     try
  142: 	do_gen_server_crash(Config, Encoding)
  143:     after
  144:         logger:remove_handler_filter(default,stop_all),
  145:         logger:remove_handler_filter(sasl,stop_all),
  146:         logger:remove_handler_filter(cth_log_redirect,stop_all)
  147:     end,
  148:     ok.
  149: 
  150: do_gen_server_crash(Config, Encoding) ->
  151:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  152:     LogDir = filename:join(PrivDir, ?MODULE),
  153:     KernelLog = filename:join(LogDir, "kernel.log"),
  154:     SaslLog = filename:join(LogDir, "sasl.log"),
  155:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(SaslLog),
  156: 
  157:     Modes = [write, {encoding, Encoding}],
  158:     application:set_env(kernel, error_logger_format_depth, 30),
  159:     error_logger:logfile({open,KernelLog}),
  160:     error_logger:add_report_handler(sasl_report_file_h,{SaslLog,Modes,all}),
  161:     ct:log("Logger config:~n~p",[logger:get_config()]),
  162:     ct:log("error_logger handlers: ~p",[error_logger:which_report_handlers()]),
  163: 
  164:     crash_me(),
  165: 
  166:     error_logger:logfile(close),
  167:     error_logger:delete_report_handler(sasl_report_file_h),
  168: 
  169:     check_file(KernelLog, utf8, 70000, 150000),
  170:     check_file(SaslLog, Encoding, 70000, 150000),
  171: 
  172:     ok = file:delete(KernelLog),
  173:     ok = file:delete(SaslLog),
  174:     ok.
  175: 
  176: check_file(File, Encoding, Min, Max) ->
  177:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(File),
  178:     Base = filename:basename(File),
  179:     io:format("*** Contents of ~s ***\n", [Base]),
  180:     case Encoding of
  181:         latin1 -> io:format("~s\n", [Bin]);
  182:         _ -> io:format("~ts\n", [Bin])
  183:     end,
  184:     Sz = byte_size(Bin),
  185:     %% Sz = string:length(string:replace(Bin, " ", "", all)),
  186:     io:format("Size: ~p (allowed range is ~p..~p)\n",
  187: 	      [Sz,Min,Max]),
  188:     if
  189: 	Sz < Min ->
  190: 	    %% Truncated? Other problem?
  191: 	    ct:fail({too_short,Base});
  192: 	Sz > Max ->
  193: 	    %% Truncation doesn't work?
  194: 	    ct:fail({too_big,Base});
  195: 	true ->
  196: 	    ok
  197:     end.
  198: 
  199: %%%
  200: %%% gen_server that crashes.
  201: %%%
  202: 
  203: crash_me() ->
  204:     {ok,SuperPid} = supervisor:start_link(sasl_report_suite_supervisor, []),
  205:     [{Id,Pid,_,_}] = supervisor:which_children(SuperPid),
  206:     HugeData = gb_sets:from_list(lists:seq(1, 100000)),
  207:     SomeData1 = list_to_atom([246]),
  208:     SomeData2 = list_to_atom([1024]),
  209:     gen_server:cast(Pid, {HugeData,SomeData1,SomeData2}),
  210:     Ref = monitor(process, Pid),
  211:     receive
  212: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,Pid,_} ->
  213: 	    supervisor:terminate_child(SuperPid, Id),
  214: 	    unlink(SuperPid),
  215: 	    exit(SuperPid, kill),
  216: 	    ok
  217:     end.
  218: 
  219: start_link() ->
  220:     gen_server:start_link(?MODULE, [], []).
  221: 
  222: init(_) ->
  223:     St = <<0:100000/unit:8>>,
  224:     {ok,St}.
  225: 
  226: handle_cast(Big, St) ->
  227:     Seq = lists:seq(1, 10000),
  228:     Latin1Atom = list_to_atom([246]),
  229:     UnicodeAtom = list_to_atom([1024]),
  230:     put(Latin1Atom, Latin1Atom),
  231:     put(UnicodeAtom, UnicodeAtom),
  232:     self() ! Latin1Atom,
  233:     self() ! UnicodeAtom,
  234:     self() ! Seq,
  235:     self() ! Seq,
  236:     self() ! Seq,
  237:     self() ! Seq,
  238:     self() ! Seq,
  239:     x = Big,
  240:     {noreply,St}.
  241: 
  242: terminate(_, _) ->
  243:     ok.
